import React, { useContext } from 'react' import { Col, Row } from 'react-bootstrap' import { GlobalContext } from '../hooks/GlobalContext' import useAnswer from '../hooks/useAnswer' const Exercises = ({ id, expression }) => { const { answOne } = useContext(GlobalContext) const [valueTyped] = useAnswer(id) return ( {expression}

=

 ) } export default Exercises
